Ingredients.8: 0.75 cup white sugar, divided, or as needed

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.

Directions.2: Combine flour, graham cracker crumbs, baking soda, baking powder, and cinnamon in a bowl.

Directions.3: Cream butter and 1/2 cup sugar together in a bowl with an electric mixer. Add egg yolk and vanilla; blend until combined. Mix in dry ingredients and continue to blend until dough sticks together, 1 to 2 minutes.

Directions.4: Roll dough into 1-inch balls and roll in remaining sugar to coat. Place on the prepared baking sheets.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until bottoms are lightly browned, 6 to 7 minutes. Cool on the baking sheets for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool, 8 to 10 minutes more.

Directions.6: Zest all 3 limes; set zest aside. Juice 2 of the limes.

Directions.7: Beat cream cheese in a bowl with an electric mixer until smooth. Mix in confectioners' sugar. Add lime juice and zest; mix to combine.

Directions.8: Spread filling on the flat sides of 1/2 of the cookies, then top with remaining cookies to form sandwich cookies.
